title: Two More Studio Display 2 Upgrades Leaked in New Report
title_bn: আরো দুটি স্টুডিও ডিসপ্লে ২ আপগ্রেড লিখিত হয়েছে নতুন রিপোর্টে
author: TechPulse
excerpt: Macworld's Filipe Espósito today again reported that Apple appears to be developing two new Studio Display models with different specs. Based on lines of code in "internal Apple files," which likely refers to a macOS Tahoe Kernel Debug Kit that leake
paragraph1: Friday February 27, 2026 7:19 am PST by Joe RossignolMacworld's Filipe Espósito today again reported that Apple appears to be developing two new Studio Display models with different specs. Based on lines of code in "internal Apple files," which likely refers to a macOS Tahoe Kernel Debug Kit that leaked online last year, Espósito continues to believe that both of the new Studio Display models will feature ProMotion, enabling up to a 120Hz refresh rate, as well as HDR support for increased brightness and dynamic range. For the higher-end Studio Display, the report has revealed two more potential upgrades that had yet to be rumored until now, including superior speakers and more and/or higher-spec ports.
paragraph2: Apple says the current Studio Display has a "high-fidelity six-speaker system" that supports Spatial Audio, and the monitor has one Thunderbolt 3 port that connects to and charges a Mac, and three USB-C ports for connecting accessories. The new Studio Display will likely feature at least one Thunderbolt 5 port, to ensure there is enough bandwidth for both 5K resolution at 120Hz and accessories. However, another leaker curiously claimed that at least one of the new Studio Display models will max out at 90Hz, so we will have to see which of these rumors is accurate. A boost to the current 60Hz refresh rate can make videos and scrolling look smoother to the eye.
paragraph3: Espósito said that the higher-end Studio Display could have a 32-inch screen, whereas the lower-end model would likely stick with a 27-inch screen. However, this particular claim was merely speculation, rather than info from the internal Apple files. Keep in mind that with a 32-inch screen, 5K resolution would not be Retina quality, so the resolution would have to increase to 6K like on Apple's higher-end Pro Display XDR.
bangla_paragraph1: ফ্রাইডে ফেব্রুয়ারি ২৭, ২০২৬ তারিখে সিএসটি দ্বারা ৭:১৯ অপরাহ্ন পিএসটি জো রোসিগ্নোল দ্বারা ম্যাকওয়ার্ল্ডের ফিলিপে এস্পোসিতো আজ আবার জানিয়েছেন যে এপল আরো দুটি স্টুডিও ডিসপ্লে মডেল বিকাশ করছে যার ভিন্ন স্পেসিফিকেশন রয়েছে। এই তথ্য পাওয়া গেছে ম্যাকওস তাহো কার্নেল ডিবাগ কিটের লাইন অফ কোডের মধ্য থেকে, যা সম্ভবত একটি অভ্যন্তরীণ এপল ফাইলের সাথে সম্পর্কিত।
bangla_paragraph2: এপল বলেছে বর্তমান স্টুডিও ডিসপ্লেতে রয়েছে একটি "উচ্চ-বিশ্বস্ত ছয়-স্পিকার সিস্টেম" যা স্পেশাল অডিওকে সমর্থন করে, এবং মনিটরে একটি থান্ডারবোল্ট ৩ পোর্ট রয়েছে যা একটি ম্যাকের সাথে যুক্ত হয় এবং চার্জ করে, এবং তিনটি ইউএসবি পোর্ট রয়েছে।

title: New Low-Cost iPad Coming Next Week: What to Expect
title_bn: নতুন নিম্ন-খরচের আইপ্যাড আগামী সপ্তাহে আসবে: কি আশা করা যায়
author: TechPulse
excerpt: One of the new products that we could see next week is a refreshed version of the low-cost iPad. As with the iPad Air, we're not expecting major changes, but it is expected to get some meaningful internal upgrades. Design The 12th-generation ‌iPad‌ i
paragraph1: Thursday February 26, 2026 1:28 pm PST by Juli CloverOne of the new products that we could see next week is a refreshed version of the low-cost iPad. As with the iPad Air, we're not expecting major changes, but it is expected to get some meaningful internal upgrades. Design The 12th-generation ‌iPad‌ isn't going to get a design update this year, and we're expecting it to have the same 11-inch edge-to-edge display with Touch ID Side Button and thick bezels.
paragraph2: Apple last updated the ‌iPad‌'s design with the 10th-generation model, giving the device a more modern look to better match the designs of the iPad Pro and iPad Air models. It's still a relatively new design, and Apple doesn't update the low-cost ‌iPad‌'s chassis often. The low-cost ‌iPad‌ is only available in a single screen size, and it is Apple's thickest tablet at 7mm. It features a Retina LCD display with no ProMotion support, no P3 wide color, and no lamination (display technology that cuts down on glare, provides a more responsive feel, and allows for a thinner size) compared to Apple's other tablets.
paragraph3: Apple makes the low-cost ‌iPad‌ in several fun colors, and we could see some new shades in 2026. Current colors include blue, pink, silver, and yellow. No changes are expected for the rear camera, front camera, USB-C port, or compatibility with accessories like the Apple Pencil.
bangla_paragraph1: আগামী সপ্তাহে আমরা কিছু নতুন পণ্য দেখতে পাব, যার মধ্যে একটি হলো নিম্ন-খরচের আইপ্যাডের আপডেট সংস্করণ। আইপ্যাড এয়ারের মতো, আমরা একটি বড় পরিবর্তনের আশা করছি না, কিন্তু এটি কিছু গুরুত্বপূর্ণ ভিতরের আপগ্রেড পাবে। ডিজাইন দ্বিতীয় প্রজন্মের আইপ্যাডের ডিজাইন আইপ্যাড এয়ারের মতো আপডেট করা হয়েছে, যা ডিভাইসটিকে আরও আধুনিক দেখাতে আইপ্যাড প্রো এবং আইপ্যাড এয়ারের মডেলের ডিজাইনের সাথে মেলে দেয়।
bangla_paragraph2: এটি এখনও একটি অত্যন্ত নতুন ডিজাইন, যা আইপ্যাড এয়ারের মতো একই সাইজের এবং বক্সের মতো। আপডেটে আমরা কিছু নতুন রঙের বিকল্প দেখতে পাবেন কিন্তু এটি প্রধান পরিবর্তন নয়।
bangla_paragraph3: আইপ্যাডের ভিতরের আপগ্রেড সম্ভবত একটি উন্নত প্রসেসর এবং একটি উন্নত গ্রাফিক্স প্রসেসিং ইউনিট (GPU) নিয়ে আসবে। এটি আইপ্যাডের পাওয়ার এবং পারফরম্যান্স উন্নত করবে।

title: Apple TV's Second-Largest Market Is Brazil, Says Eddy Cue
title_bn: Apple TV's Second-Largest Market Is Brazil, Says Eddy Cue
author: TechPulse
excerpt: Apple's SVP of services Eddy Cue has revealed that Brazil is Apple TV's second-largest market by subscriber count and its fastest-growing, in an interview with Brazilian newspaper Folha de S. Paulo (via 9to5Mac). Speaking on the sidelines of Apple's
paragraph1: Friday February 27, 2026 6:01 am PST by Tim HardwickApple's SVP of services Eddy Cue has revealed that Brazil is Apple TV's second-largest market by subscriber count and its fastest-growing, in an interview with Brazilian newspaper Folha de S. Paulo (via 9to5Mac). Speaking on the sidelines of Apple's recent media event in Santa Monica where the company previewed its 2026 content slate, Cue acknowledged that Apple has yet to produce any original content in Brazil.
paragraph2: Competitors like Netflix, Amazon, and Disney, meanwhile, have turned the country into a major production hub, leaving Apple in catch-up mode. "It doesn't move as quickly as I'd like, especially if you want to be truly good, but we'll get there," Cue said. "I know Brazilians want quality – I appreciate that – and I also know there's a lot of opportunity in Brazil to create strong content." Cue also reaffirmed Apple's commitment to theatrical releases through distribution partnerships, pointing to the success of "F1: The Movie," which was released in theaters by Warner Bros.
paragraph3: and went on to earn an Oscar nomination. Cue conceded that "the bar for leaving home and going to the movie theater" is getting increasingly higher, but he believes the experience remains irreplaceable. "There's no substitute for that experience – for watching a film collectively, going on a date at the movies, enjoying a night out with friends or children watching a film," Cue said.

title: Monzo former CEO TS Anil appointed board vice-chair in boardroom shake-up
title_bn: মনজোর সাবেক সিইও টিএস আনিল নিযুক্ত বোর্ড ভাইস-চেয়ারে
author: TechPulse
excerpt: Monzo’s former CEO TS Anil has been appointed vice-chair of Monzo’s board, in a shake-up which sees an executive from an existing Monzo investor and a former Y Combinator executive take non-executive ...
paragraph1: Monzo’s former CEO TS Anil has been appointed vice-chair of Monzo’s board, in a shake-up which sees an executive from an existing Monzo investor and a former Y Combinator executive take non-executive board seats. The board reshuffle follows a boardroom battle which saw Anil step down as CEO of the UK challenger bank amid concerns over the digital bank's international expansion and his post-IPO commitment. Anil's exit, which led to objections from some Monzo shareholders over his departure, was announced by Monzo in October last year.
paragraph2: He has been replaced by Diana Layfield, a banker who has also previously worked at Google, and who has now started in the CEO role. One of the new non-executive board appointments is Vinay Yarlagadda, who is a managing director at Singapore’s GIC, a sovereign fund, which is an existing investor in Monzo. The other new non-executive director is Anu Hariharan, the founder of Avra, a US VC and accelerator, who was previously a managing director at Y Combinator. Monzo, which has over 14m customers, was valued at $5.
paragraph3: 9bn in 2024 in a secondary share sale, backed by GIC and StepStone Group. Gary Hoffman, chair of the Monzo board, said: “I am delighted to welcome both Anu and Vinay who bring a wide range of experience as Monzo enters an exciting new phase of growth. "We’re also welcoming TS in a non-executive role as vice chair where, with the rest of the board, he’ll continue as planned to advise and support Monzo's long-term strategic vision as Diana takes the baton as Group CEO.
bangla_paragraph1: মনজোর সাবেক সিইও টিএস আনিলকে মনজোর বোর্ডের ভাইস-চেয়ার হিসেবে নিযুক্ত করা হয়েছে, যা একটি শেষ পর্যন্ত দেখা যায় যা একটি বোর্ডরুম যুদ্ধের পরে দেখা যায় যেখানে আনিল ইউনাইটেড কম্পানির সিইও পদ থেকে পদত্যাগ করেছিলেন।
bangla_paragraph2: বোর্ডের পুনর্গঠনের পরে, তিনি ডায়ানা লেইফিল্ড দ্বারা প্রতিস্থাপিত হয়েছেন, যিনি একজন ব্যাঙ্কার যিনি গুগলেও আগে কাজ করেছেন এবং যিনি এখন সিইও হিসাবে কাজ শুরু করেছেন।
bangla_paragraph3: একজন নতুন নন-এক্সিকিউটিভ বোর্ড নিয়োগ হল ভিনায় যারলাগড্ডা, যিনি একজন এক্সিকিউটিভ হিসাবে একটি বিদ্যমান মনজো বিনিয়োগকারী থেকে এসেছেন।

title: Interrupting the scroll: This founder is using social media as ground zero for a digital reset
title_bn: Interrupting the scroll: This founder is using social media as ground zero for a digital reset
author: TechPulse
excerpt: I’m sure the creators of the internet never thought of a time when phrases like doomscrolling, social media addiction, and bed rot would be mainstream. But here we are. If you’ve ever jolted yourself ...
paragraph1: I’m sure the creators of the internet never thought of a time when phrases like doomscrolling, social media addiction, and bed rot would be mainstream. But here we are. If you’ve ever jolted yourself awake by dropping your phone on your face at 1am, or instinctively reached for it in a room full of strangers just to avoid discomfort, you’ve felt it too — that quiet, compulsive pull.
paragraph2: What began as a tool for connection has, for many, become an unhealthy reflex. Valeriia Chobotok is a solo founder whose path — from working inside Ukraine’s tech startup ecosystem to building communities that foster real-world connection — has culminated in a new mission: tackling the unintentional use of phones and laptops by building an ecosystem she calls Human. For Chobotok, entrepreneurship was never a sudden decision — it felt inevitable. “Honestly, I think it started when I was a baby,” she says.
paragraph3: “I always wanted to become a businesswoman. I had big dreams about creating something of my own and running something myself.” Her parents had day jobs but also an entrepreneurial drive.

title: ISPTech secures €5.5M seed to improve in-orbit mobility
title_bn: ইস্পিটেক ইউরো ৫.৫ মিলিয়ন সীড সিকিউর করে অবজেক্টে মোবিলিটি উন্নত করতে
author: TechPulse
excerpt: InSpacePropulsion Technologies (ISPTech), a German space tech company developing propulsionsystems designed to enable fast and agile in-orbit manoeuvring, has raised €5.5million to advance deployment ...
paragraph1: InSpacePropulsion Technologies (ISPTech), a German space tech company developing propulsion systems designed to enable fast and agile in-orbit manoeuvring, has raised €5.5 million to advance deployment of its non-toxic propulsion technologies for operational missions. The round was led by Join Capital, with participation from High-Tech Gründerfonds (HTGF), Faber, First Momentum Ventures, Lightfield Equity, Final Frontier Liftoff, the German Aerospace Center (DLR), and Start-up BW Seed Fonds, among others.
paragraph2: As satellite constellations grow denser and missions become more complex, spacecraft must reliably change orbits and avoid collisions with minimal margin for error. Existing propulsion solutions often lack the agility, responsiveness, and thrust required for these demands. At the same time, regulatory pressure is accelerating the phase-out of conventional systems that rely on highly toxic propellants such as hydrazine, prompting satellite manufacturers to reassess propulsion choices and seek safer alternatives. ISPTech is positioning its technology to address these trends.
paragraph3: The company is developing spaceflight-ready propulsion systems and expanding commercial engagement with satellite manufacturers and mission operators, with potential applications also spanning defence, in-orbit servicing, and refuelling. Dr. Lukas Werling, CEO and co-founder of ISPTech, said that although reusable rockets have improved access to space, future growth will depend on improved in-orbit mobility.
bangla_paragraph1: জার্মান স্পেস টেক কোম্পানি ইনস্পেস প্রপালশন টেকনোলজিজ (ইস্পিটেক) যা দ্রুত এবং আগল অবজেক্টে ম্যানুভারিং করতে প্রপালশন সিস্টেম বিকাশ করছে, তারা তাদের অপারেশনাল মিশনের জন্য নন-টক্সিক প্রপালশন টেকনোলজিজ প্রসারিত করতে ইউরো ৫.৫ মিলিয়ন সংগ্রহ করেছে। এই রাউন্ডটি জোইন ক্যাপিটাল দ্বারা নেতৃত্ব দেওয়া হয়েছে।

title: What are world models — and are they Europe’s winning AI bet?
title_bn: What are world models — and are they Europe’s winning AI bet?
author: TechPulse
paragraph1: The AI debate has been dominated by large language models used to power the likes of ChatGPT, Claude and Gemini. But could the next wave of AI look very different?Yes, some European AI watchers say.
paragraph2: Attention is shifting to so-called “world models” — systems designed to build internal representations of how the world works, rather than simply predicting the next word in a sentence.A number of prominent researchers, including former Meta chief AI scientist Yann LeCun, have argued this approach could overcome some of the limitations of today’s LLMs — and have launched startups to prove it.On this week’s episode of the Sifted Podcast, host Freya Pratty is joined by senior reporters Daphné Leprince-Ringuet and Anne Sraders to unpack the hype around world models. What exactly are they?
paragraph3: What real-world applications might they unlock? And with researchers like LeCun choosing to base new ventures in Europe, could this be an area where the continent builds a competitive edge in the global AI race?Listen on Apple Podcasts Listen on Spotify Listen elsewhereSign up to our AI and deeptech newsletter here: https://sifted.

title: Dash0 targets $1bn valuation with Balderton-led funding round, reports say
title_bn: Dash0 $1 বিলিয়ন মূল্যায়নের লক্ষ্য রেখে বালডার্টন-সহ বিনিয়োগের ডাউন রাউন্ডে অংশ নিচ্ছে: প্রতিবেদনের বিবৃতি
author: TechPulse
paragraph1: Dash0, an AI-native platform that helps companies monitor their cloud systems, is seeking investment for a funding round that would value the company at $1bn, according to reports. Founded in 2023, Dash0 originally launched in Germany but has since moved its headquarters to New York. The company retains a strong operational presence in Berlin and elsewhere in Europe.
paragraph2: Dash0’s platform helps developers and engineers monitor and troubleshoot problems in the cloud. The company offers an AI agent, Agent0, which acts as a copilot, helping users find the root cause of issues faster.In October, Dash0 announced it had raised a $35m Series A funding round, backed by Accel, Cherry Ventures and Dig Ventures. On Friday, Bloomberg reported the company was in talks with London-based Balderton Capital to lead a fresh round of funding, which would value Dash0 at $1bn, making it the latest European startup to achieve unicorn status.
paragraph3: Founder and CEO Mirko Novakovic previously told Sifted it was unclear how many European investors would contribute to future fundraises, saying he had taken investment from Cherry Ventures in part to increase the region’s representation on the company’s cap table. “There are not so many European funds who can do A, B, C at some stages. So I said ‘Probably this A round is the last chance for me to get a German or European VC in,’” he said.
bangla_paragraph1: Dash0, একটি AI-সম্পৃক্ত প্ল্যাটফর্ম যা কোম্পানিগুলিকে তাদের ওয়ানক্লাউড সিস্টেমগুলি পর্যবেক্ষণ করতে সাহায্য করে, একটি বিনিয়োগের ডাউন রাউন্ডে অংশ নিচ্ছে যা কোম্পানিটিকে $1 বিলিয়ন মূল্যায়নের মূল্য দেবে, বলা হচ্ছে প্রতিবেদনে। প্রতিষ্ঠিত হওয়ার পর থেকে 2023 সালে, Dash0 মূলত জার্মানিতে ল্যান্ডিং করেছিল কিন্তু এখন পর্যন্ত নিউইয়র্কে তার সদর দফতর স্থানান্তর করেছে। কোম্পানিটি তার প্রযুক্তি বিকাশের জন্য অর্থায়নের প্রয়োজনীয়তা অনুভব করছে।
bangla_paragraph2: Dash0-এর প্ল্যাটফর্ম ডেভেলপার এবং ইঞ্জিনিয়ারদের ওয়ানক্লাউড সিস্টেমগুলি পর্যবেক্ষণ ও সমস্যা সমাধানে সাহায্য করে। কোম্পানিটি একটি AI এজেন্ট, Agent0, প্রদান করে যা একটি কোপিলট হিসেবে কাজ করে, ব্যবহারকারীদের সমস্যার মূল কারণ খুঁজে বের করতে সাহায্য করে।
bangla_paragraph3: Agent0 একটি স্বয়ংক্রিয় কোপিলট যা ব্যবহারকারীদের সমস্যা সমাধানে সাহায্য করে এবং তাদের সময় বাঁচায়। এটি ব্যবহারকারীদের সমস্যার মূল কারণ খুঁজে বের করতে এবং সমস্যাটি সমাধান করতে সাহায্য করে।

title: Why RAM price and SSD Price in Bangladesh is So high
title_bn: র‍্যাম এবং এসডি এর দাম বাংলাদেশে কেন সুউচ্চ হচ্ছে?
author: TechPulse
excerpt: For last few months, price of RAM and that of SSD in Bangladesh has raised like it never did before. Many of you might be wondering why this is happening. First of all, you all know that there is no brand in Bangladesh that produce or even rebrand SS
paragraph1: For last few months, price of RAM and that of SSD in Bangladesh has raised like it never did before. Many of you might be wondering why this is happening. First of all, you all know that there is no brand in Bangladesh that produce or even rebrand SSD or RAM.
paragraph2: Rather the demand of RAM and SSD always is fulfilled by importing from China or other countries. Although there are some local syndicates controlling or playing with the prices, the actual condition depends on the global market or the main origin of the products, that is China. We shall try to investigate why the price hike happened. A lot of you know that the surge of AI Business and infrastructures has caused the manufacturers to shift their focus entirely to that sector.
paragraph3: Instead of making memory chips for general consumers, they all have been busy to make high bandwidth memory or HBM. You’ve probably already heard in countless reels and shorts that AI is responsible for the current situation, so we won’t go too deep into that. Long story short: AI is expanding globally.
bangla_paragraph1: শেষ কয়েক মাস ধরে বাংলাদেশে র‍্যাম এবং এসডি এর দাম বেড়েছে যেমন কখনো আর কখনো। আপনারা সবাই এটাই চিনতে পারবেন যে বাংলাদেশে এসডি বা র‍্যাম তৈরি বা পুনর্বিপণন করে কোনো ব্র্যান্ড নেই।
bangla_paragraph2: বরং র‍্যাম এবং এসডির চাহিদা চীন বা অন্যান্য দেশ থেকে আমদানি করে পূরণ করা হয়। যদিও কিছু স্থানীয় সিন্ডিকেট দাম নিয়ন্ত্রণ করে বা খেলার মাধ্যমে দাম নির্ধারণ করে থাকে, তবে আসল অবস্থা হলো দেখানো হচ্ছে না।

title: OpenAI to establish London as biggest research hub outside the US
title_bn: ওপেনএআই লন্ডনকে মার্কিন বাইরে সবচেয়ে বড় গবেষণা কেন্দ্র হিসেবে প্রতিষ্ঠা করবে
author: TechPulse
excerpt: ChatGPT developer OpenAI is to make London its largest research hub outside of its San Francisco headquarters, it announced today, signifying a vote of confidence in the city. The US AI frontier lab, ...
paragraph1: ChatGPT developer OpenAI is to make London its largest research hub outside of its San Francisco headquarters, it announced today, signifying a vote of confidence in the city. The US AI frontier lab, which currently employs around 30 researchers in London, has pledged to further increase investment in its London hub, but did not specify figures. OpenAI, whose European headquarters are in Dublin, said that its London team was contributing to key parts of OpenAI’s work, including on its AI-powered coding assistant Codex and its GPT-5.
paragraph2: 2 LLM (large language model). OpenAI cited the UK’s "world-class talent" across machine learning and the sciences, and “strong culture of cross-disciplinary collaboration”, as well as its leading universities and scientific institutions as reasons for investing in London. The move comes as OpenAI looks to battle for talent against the likes of Google's DeepMind, which employs around 2,000 people in the UK. OpenAI said: “In committing to establishing London as its next research hub, researchers in London will own key components of OpenAI’s frontier model development, strengthening the data, evaluation, alignment and reliability work that helps ensure advanced AI systems are safe, robust and useful in the real world."
paragraph3: Science and Tech Secretary Liz Kendall said: "OpenAI naming London as its largest global research hub outside the US is a huge vote of confidence in the UK’s world-leading position at the cutting edge of AI research. It also reaffirms the UK’s global leadership as the place to pursue AI innovation that is both safe and transformative.” Mark Chen, OpenAI chief research officer, said: “We are excited to establish London as a major research hub for OpenAI, building on the leading work our London team is already doing to support our latest breakthroughs.
bangla_paragraph1: চ্যাটজিপিটি উন্নয়নকারী ওপেনএআই বলেছে যে তারা তাদের সান ফ্রান্সিসকো সদর দফতরের বাইরে লন্ডনকে তাদের বৃহত্তম গবেষণা কেন্দ্র হিসেবে প্রতিষ্ঠা করবে, এটি আজ ঘোষণা করেছে, যা শহরের প্রতি একটি ভোট দেখায়। মার্কিন এআই ফ্রন্টিয়ার ল্যাব, যা বর্তমানে লন্ডনে ৩০ জন গবেষককে নিয়োগ করেছে, লন্ডনে আরও বেশি বিনিয়োগ করার প্রতিশ্রুতি দিয়েছে।
bangla_paragraph2: ওপেনএআই বলেছে যে তারা লন্ডনে তাদের গবেষণা কেন্দ্র বৃদ্ধি করবে, যার মধ্যে দুটি এলএলএম (বড় ভাষা মডেল) অন্তর্ভুক্ত রয়েছে। ওপেনএআই যুক্তি দিয়েছে যে যুক্তরাজ্যের মেশিন লার্নিং এবং বিজ্ঞানে বিশ্বশ্রেষ্ঠ প্রতিভা রয়েছে এবং বিভিন্ন শাখার সম্মিলিত সহযোগিতার একটি শক্তিশালী সংস্কৃতি রয়েছে, এবং এছাড়াও তারা যুক্তরাজ্যের শীর্ষস্থানীয় বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়গুলিকে সম্বোধন করেছে।

title: €4.5M raised by FlyFocus to scale European drone production
title_bn: ৪.৫ মিলিয়ন ইউরো সংগ্রহে ফ্লাইফোসাস ইউরোপে ড্রোন উৎপাদন বৃদ্ধির জন্য
author: TechPulse
excerpt: FlyFocus, a Poland-based defence technology companyspecialising in unmanned aerial systems (UAS) and avionics, has raised €4.5million in a funding round led by ffVC, with participation from the NCBRIn...
paragraph1: FlyFocus, a Poland-based defence technology company specialising in unmanned aerial systems (UAS) and avionics, has raised €4.5 million in a funding round led by ffVC, with participation from the NCBR Investment Fund, the venture capital arm of Poland’s National Centre for Research and Development. The investment marks the company’s first institutional round following eight years of self-funded growth.
paragraph2: The raise comes as Europe’s drone market faces growing reliance on non-European technologies, particularly components originating in China. Dependencies in areas such as batteries and flight controllers are increasingly viewed as potential risks to defence readiness. Founded in 2017 by engineers with backgrounds in aerospace and competitive aeromodelling, FlyFocus was built on the premise that trusted, European-controlled supply chains and technological sovereignty are important for military security. Its systems are manufactured using components sourced exclusively from NATO-aligned suppliers, a policy the company says supports supply-chain transparency and compliance with European defence procurement requirements.
paragraph3: The company’s portfolio spans intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance platforms, loitering systems, and counter-drone technologies, alongside a tethered UAV solution for persistent aerial surveillance already used by government and institutional customers. FlyFocus retains full ownership of its software stack (including flight control, mission planning, and ground control software) developed in close collaboration with operators. Combined with a modular hardware architecture, this enables the company to deliver regular upgrades in response to evolving operational needs.
bangla_paragraph1: পোল্যান্ডের একটি সামরিক প্রযুক্তি কোম্পানি ফ্লাইফোসাস, যা অযানবাহী উড়োজাহাজ ব্যবস্থা (UAS) এবং এভিয়নিক্সে বিশেষজ্ঞ, ফ্যান্ডিং রাউন্ডের নেতৃত্বে ffVC এবং পোল্যান্ডের জাতীয় গবেষণা ও উন্নয়নের কেন্দ্রের বেসরকারি বিনিয়োগ ফান্ড এনসিবিআর ইনভেস্টমেন্ট ফান্ডের অংশগ্রহণে ৪.৫ মিলিয়ন ইউরো সংগ্রহ করেছে৷
bangla_paragraph2: এই সংগ্রহের সময় ইউরোপের ড্রোন বাজার চীনের উৎপাদিত উপাদানের উপর বেশি নির্ভরশীল হচ্ছে, বিশেষ করে ব্যাটারি এবং ফ্লাইট কন্ট্রোলের ক্ষেত্রে৷

title: Why Ukraine is becoming a global healthtech frontier
title_bn: উক্রেন কেন একটি গ্লোবাল হেলথটেক ফ্রন্টিয়ার হচ্ছে
author: TechPulse
excerpt: Ukraine offers a rare combination: deep technical talent, a startup ecosystem tested under extreme conditions, digital-first public infrastructure, supportive regulation, and urgent national demand th...
paragraph1: Ukraine offers a rare combination: deep technical talent, a startup ecosystem tested under extreme conditions, digital-first public infrastructure, supportive regulation, and urgent national demand that accelerates adoption cycles. For investor Serhiy Tokarev, co-founder and general partner at investment firm ROOSH, that urgency has reshaped an entire sector. The full-scale war pushed Ukraine’s healthcare system to its limits, forcing doctors, engineers, and founders to build fast, scalable solutions for some of the most complex challenges imaginable: trauma care, mental health, rehabilitation, logistics, and access.
paragraph2: “In Ukraine, health innovation isn’t optional — it’s urgent,” he asserts. “And what emerged is one of the world’s most unexpected healthtech frontiers — rooted in necessity, driven by endurance, and scaling fast.” The state of Ukrainian healthtech In 2024, the top ten startup funding rounds in Ukraine — across all sectors — raised over $300 million. One of the standout healthtech deals was Esper Bionics, which secured $5 million in a round led by YZR Capital.
paragraph3: Behind these headline rounds sits a maturing ecosystem. Local incubators and international backers such as the UVCA https://uvca.eu and the Ukrainian Startup Fund provide funding, mentorship, and infrastructure to help founders scale.
bangla_paragraph1: উক্রেনে একটি অসাধারণ সংমিশ্রণ রয়েছে: গভীর প্রযুক্তিগত দক্ষতা, অত্যন্ত শিক্ষিত স্টার্টআপ ইকোসিস্টেম, ডিজিটাল প্রথম পাবলিক আইনসমূহ, সমর্থনকারী নিয়ন্ত্রণ এবং দ্রুত গ্রহণের চক্র ত্বরান্বিত করে এমন দেশজ চাহিদা। বিনিয়োগকারী সের্হিয় টোকারেভের মতে, ইনভেস্ট কোম্পানির সহ-প্রতিষ্ঠাতা এবং জেনারেল পার্টনার সের্হিয় টোকারেভ বলেন, উক্রেনে হেলথ ইনোভেশন বিকল্প নয়, এটি দ্রুত প্রয়োজনীয়।
bangla_paragraph2: তিনি বলেন, "উক্রেনে হেলথ ইনোভেশন বিকল্প নয়, এটি দ্রুত প্রয়োজনীয়।" তিনি আরও বলেন, "এবং যা উদ্ভূত হয়েছে তা হল বিশ্বের অন্যতম অসংখ্য হেলথটেক ফ্রন্টিয়ার, যা প্রয়োজনীয়তার মূলে, দীর্ঘস্থায়ী শক্তি দ্বারা চালিত এবং সময়ের সাথে সাথে বিকশিত হচ্ছে।"

title: Mistral and Accenture strike deal to help businesses deploy AI
title_bn: মিস্ট্রাল ও এক্সেনচার একটি চুক্তি স্বাক্ষর করেছে ব্যবসাগুলোকে AI সম্পৃক্ত করতে
author: TechPulse
excerpt: French AI startup Mistral has struck a multi-year deal with consulting giant Accenture to help companies deploy AI technology and customise their AI offering. The deal comes as AI companies like Mistr...
paragraph1: French AI startup Mistral has struck a multi-year deal with consulting giant Accenture to help companies deploy AI technology and customise their AI offering. The deal comes as AI companies like Mistral, Europe’s most prominent AI model firm, look to boost revenues by attracting businesses to move from experimenting with AI to long-term deployment. Mistral’s bet is that AI's future rests in offering businesses flexibility to customise and tailor AI systems to their needs.
paragraph2: The deal will see Mistral, valued at around €11.7bn, make its AI models, known for their open-source approach, available to Accenture. The two companies will also co-develop AI products and help clients deploy AI in line with regional requirements. They will also launch certification and training programmes for clients while Accenture employees will have access to Mistral's AI Studio, which allows users to quickly develop AI agents and applications.
paragraph3: Mistral, mainly known for developing AI models, is looking to position itself with a full-stack infrastructure offering. Its other clients include SAP, Cisco and ASML Holdings. Mauro Macchi, CEO for Europe, the Middle East, and Africa at Accenture, said: “Our clients are looking for AI solutions that combine world-class performance with the complete ownership that Mistral AI’s technology offers enterprises.
bangla_paragraph1: ফরাসি AI স্টার্টআপ মিস্ট্রাল একটি বছরের চুক্তি স্বাক্ষর করেছে এক্সেনচার এর সাথে যাতে তারা ব্যবসাগুলোকে AI প্রযুক্তি সম্পৃক্ত করতে এবং AI পণ্য বিকাশের জন্য তাদের পণ্যটিকে কাস্টমাইজ করতে সাহায্য করতে পারে। এই চুক্তি এসেছে যখন AI কোম্পানি যেমন মিস্ট্রাল যা ইউরোপের সবচেয়ে উল্লেখযোগ্য AI মডেল কোম্পানি, তারা আয় বৃদ্ধি করতে চায় ব্যবসাগুলোকে AI সম্পৃক্ত করতে এবং তাদের আয় বৃদ্ধি করতে চায়।
bangla_paragraph2: এই চুক্তির অধীনে মিস্ট্রাল, যা প্রায় €11.7 বিলিয়ন মূল্যের, তার AI মডেলগুলো যা খুব জনপ্রিয় এবং খুবই উন্মুক্ত সুবিধার, এক্সেনচারের সাথে সহযোগিতা করবে। দুই কোম্পানি একসাথে AI পণ্য বিকাশ করবে এবং ক্লায়েন্টদের কাছে AI পণ্য বিকাশে সাহায্য করবে।
bangla_paragraph3: মিস্ট্রাল এবং এক্সেনচার এই কোম্পানির মধ্যে একটি মূল চুক্তি হিসেবে এই চুক্তি স্বাক্ষর করেছে যা ব্যবসাগুলোকে AI সম্পৃক্ত করতে সাহায্য করবে। এই চুক্তির মাধ্যমে মিস্ট্রাল এবং এক্সেনচার তাদের ক্লায়েন্টদের কাছে AI পণ্য বিকাশে সাহায্য করবে এবং তাদের ক্লায়েন্টদের কাছে AI সম্পৃক্ত করবে।

title: From big bets to sector diversity: the Dutch tech ecosystem
title_bn: From big bets to sector diversity: the Dutch tech ecosystem
author: TechPulse
excerpt: In 2025, European tech investment reached €72 billion,making it the second-strongest year of the past three. Within this landscape,the Netherlands ranked fourth, behind the UK, Germany, and France, wi...
paragraph1: In 2025, European tech investment reached €72 billion, making it the second-strongest year of the past three. Within this landscape, the Netherlands ranked fourth, behind the UK, Germany, and France, with €6.9 billion raised.
paragraph2: Capital was primarily directed toward energy and semiconductor projects, reflecting the capital-intensive nature of infrastructure and hardware investments. Cloud and software also featured prominently among the biggest rounds, highlighting sustained investment in digital infrastructure and core platforms. Outside these leading segments, e-commerce activity was largely shaped by a single late-year deal, while fintech funding was distributed across several mid- to large-sized rounds rather than driven by one outlier. Healthtech formed a secondary layer of activity, supported by multiple financings during the year.
paragraph3: Overall, the largest Dutch deals were concentrated in a handful of strategic sectors (particularly energy, semiconductors, cloud, and software) underscoring the Netherlands’ growing role in infrastructure and deeptech financing, while continued activity across fintech, healthcare, and emerging technologies points to a broadly diversified ecosystem (for more detailed analyses of the European technology ecosystem, check out Tech.eu’s annual report: European Tech 2025–The Big Picture). Here are the 10 companies that raised the most in 2025.

title: EV startup Einride raises $113m ahead of SPAC listing in New York
title_bn: ইনরাইডের সাথে সংযুক্ত একটি স্পেসিয়াল পারপাস অ্যাকোয়াইজেশন কোম্পানি নিউইয়র্কে পাবলিক লিস্টিং আগে $113 মিলিয়ন সংগ্রহ করেছে
author: TechPulse
paragraph1: Swedish EV startup Einride and its SPAC (special purpose acquisition company) Legato have raised $113m ahead of its planned listing later this year.The financing came from new and existing investors, including an unnamed global asset management company based on the West Coast of the US and Stockholm-based EQT Ventures.Founded in 2016 and based in Stockholm and Texas, Einride helps companies switch their logistics to electric and autonomous vehicles.
paragraph2: Its business model combines “Freight-Capacity-as-a-Service” with a SaaS platform that provides the full ecosystem needed to run electric and autonomous operations.So far, investors have committed around $213m to support the listing, including the latest funding announcement and Einride's previously announced crossover financing of approximately $100m. The funding announced now exceeds the previous announced expectations of raising $100m.The new capital will be used to support Einride's tech development and global expansion, including autonomous deployments across North America, Europe, and the Middle East, as well as investments in other commercial applications of its freight platform, according to the CEO, Roozbeh Charli.
paragraph3: “With this additional capital, we believe we are well positioned to scale our commercial deployments of electric and autonomous freight solutions with both existing and new customers, while continuing to invest in our automated driving system and intelligent freight platform,” Charli said in a statement.Are SPACs on the rise again?SPACs are listed shell companies that raise money from investors to merge with a private business, saving them the time and money usually required for a full IPO roadshow.

author: TechPulse
excerpt: The craze of AI is at its peak at this moment. Across every region and country, the world seems to be caught in an AI fever. New AI startups are emerging almost every day; infrastructures of varying sizes and scales are being developed at a rapid pac
paragraph1: The craze of AI is at its peak at this moment. Across every region and country, the world seems to be caught in an AI fever. New AI startups are emerging almost every day; infrastructures of varying sizes and scales are being developed at a rapid pace.
paragraph2: Entrepreneurs are shifting their focus toward AI-driven ventures, and AI-centric investments are on the rise.NVIDIA Blackwell is a lineup of workstation graphics cards. Like many other countries, Bangladesh is experiencing an unprecedented level of excitement and interest in AI. Many established companies are exploring the potential of AI, while others are already investing heavily to build their own AI ecosystems.
paragraph3: Small startups and business owners also believe that AI will be a foundational pillar of the future economy and society. Even freelancers are setting up personal AI workstations and home labs to maximize productivity. NVIDIA Blackwell is a lineup of workstation graphics cards.
bangla_paragraph1: এই সময়ে AI-এর চাহিদা শীর্ষে রয়েছে। সমস্ত অঞ্চল ও দেশে বিশ্ব একটি AI ফীভারে আচ্ছাদিত। দিনের পর দিন নতুন এআই স্টার্টআপ উদ্ভূত হচ্ছে; বিভিন্ন আকার ও আয়তনের স্থাপত্য দ্রুত গতিতে নির্মাণ করা হচ্ছে।
bangla_paragraph2: উদ্যোক্তারা AI-ভিত্তিক ব্যবসায় তাদের ফোকাস স্থানান্তর করছেন এবং AI-কেন্দ্রিক বিনিয়োগ বৃদ্ধি পাচ্ছে। NVIDIA Blackwell হলো একটি লাইনআপ কার্যক্ষম কার্ড। যেমন অন্যান্য দেশে, বাংলাদেশেও NVIDIA এর এই লাইনআপ কার্যক্ষম কার্ড প্রস্তুত রয়েছে।
bangla_paragraph3: এই লাইনআপ কার্যক্ষম কার্ড NVIDIA এর কাছে একটি কার্যকর সমাধান হিসেবে কাজ করবে যা বিশেষজ্ঞদের এবং পেশাদারদের জন্য উপযোগী হবে।

title: NVIDIA RTX PRO 2000 Blackwell 16 GB GDDR7 Graphics Card
title_bn: NVIDIA RTX PRO 2000 Blackwell 16 GB GDDR7 গ্রাফিক্স কার্ড
author: TechPulse
excerpt: The NVIDIA RTX PRO 2000 Blackwell 16GB is a high-performance, power-efficient professional GPU designed for designers, engineers, and developers who need top-tier reliability in space-constrained workstations. Built on the cutting-edge NVIDIA Blackwe
paragraph1: The NVIDIA RTX PRO 2000 Blackwell 16GB is a high-performance, power-efficient professional GPU designed for designers, engineers, and developers who need top-tier reliability in space-constrained workstations. Built on the cutting-edge NVIDIA Blackwell architecture, this card provides a substantial leap in AI-augmented productivity and professional graphics, allowing users to future-proof their desktops for modern agentic AI and advanced 3D visualization. As professional workflows increasingly shift toward local AI inference and complex neural rendering, the RTX PRO 2000 Blackwell offers an ideal balance.
paragraph2: It combines 16GB of ultra-fast GDDR7 memory with a lean, dual-slot low-profile design, delivering a massive performance upgrade over the previous generation without requiring extreme power or cooling overhead. Specifications of NVIDIA RTX PRO 2000 Blackwell 16GB Announced in March 2025 (with widespread availability in late 2025), the RTX PRO 2000 Blackwell 16GB GDDR7 Graphics Card is manufactured using TSMC’s custom 4N process and features the GB203 die containing 21.9 billion transistors. It is equipped with 4,352 CUDA cores, alongside 136 5th Gen Tensor Cores and 34 4th Gen RT Cores, specifically engineered for high-speed AI inference and physically accurate raytracing.
paragraph3: The GPU is designed for sustained professional reliability, operating at a base clock of 982 MHz with boost speeds reaching up to 1957 MHz. Its memory subsystem features 16GB of GDDR7 with ECC (Error Correcting Code) on a 128-bit bus, providing 288 GB/s of bandwidth. Running on the latest PCIe Gen 5.
bangla_paragraph1: NVIDIA RTX PRO 2000 Blackwell 16GB একটি উচ্চ-কার্যক্ষম, শক্তি-সম্ভালন পেশাদার জিপিইউ যা ডিজাইনার, ইঞ্জিনিয়ার এবং ডেভেলপারদের জন্য নির্ভরযোগ্যতার শীর্ষ স্তরের প্রয়োজন যারা স্থান-সীমিত ওয়ার্কস্টেশনে বিশ্বস্ত পারফরম্যান্সের প্রয়োজন পূরণ করে। কাটিং-এজ NVIDIA Blackwell অর্কিটেকচারের ভিত্তিতে নির্মিত এই কার্ডটি একটি বৃহৎ পারফরম্যান্স আপগ্রেড প্রদান করে যা আগের প্রজন্মের তুলনায় অত্যধিক শক্তি বা শীতলীকরণের প্রয়োজন ছাড়াই।
bangla_paragraph2: এটি 16GB এর উচ্চ-গতির GDDR7 মেমরি সহ একটি দুই-স্লট নিম্ন-প্রোফাইল ডিজাইন একত্রিত করে, এটি পূর্ববর্তী প্রজন্মের তুলনায় একটি বিশাল পারফরম্যান্স আপগ্রেড প্রদান করে।

title: NVIDIA RTX PRO 4000 Blackwell SFF Edition Graphics Card
title_bn: NVIDIA RTX PRO 4000 Blackwell SFF Edition গ্রাফিক্স কার্ড
author: TechPulse
excerpt: The NVIDIA RTX PRO 4000 Blackwell SFF (Small Form Factor) Edition is a groundbreaking professional GPU designed to bring flagship-level AI and graphics performance to space-constrained environments. Built on the cutting-edge NVIDIA Blackwell architec
paragraph1: The NVIDIA RTX PRO 4000 Blackwell SFF (Small Form Factor) Edition is a groundbreaking professional GPU designed to bring flagship-level AI and graphics performance to space-constrained environments. Built on the cutting-edge NVIDIA Blackwell architecture, this low-profile, dual-slot card delivers massive leaps in efficiency and compute power, making it the premier choice for compact workstations, medical imaging devices, and high-density edge computing. As professional demands shift toward real-time AI and high-fidelity neural rendering, the RTX PRO 4000 SFF Blackwell bridges the gap between portability and power.
paragraph2: By integrating 24GB of GDDR7 memory within a lean 70W power envelope, it enables elite performance without requiring specialized power or thermal management. Specifications of NVIDIA RTX PRO 4000 Blackwell SFF Edition Officially unveiled at SIGGRAPH 2025, the NVIDIA RTX PRO 4000 Blackwell SFF Edition Graphics Card is manufactured using the TSMC 4N custom process. It is powered by the GB203 graphics processor, featuring 8,960 CUDA cores. This model includes next-generation 5th Gen Tensor Cores and 4th Gen RT Cores, specifically engineered to accelerate generative AI, local LLM prototyping, and physically accurate 3D designs.
paragraph3: The GPU is designed for maximum efficiency, with a base clock frequency of 577 MHz and a boost clock of 1432 MHz. It features 24GB of GDDR7 memory with Error Correcting Code (ECC) on a 192-bit bus, providing 432 GB/s of bandwidth. Operating via a PCIe Gen 5.
